protectionPolicy.name: MSSQL - Standard
host.name: vmtstdbs40a.rsvgnw.local
asset.name: SPINT_Service_UsageAndHealth
result.error.reason: Transaction log backup of SPINT_Service_UsageAndHealth is skipped from backup on vmtstdbs40a.rsvgnw.local \\ INSTANCE3.
result.error.detailedDescription: Database recovery model property is set to simple. Transaction log backups are not allowed if recovery model property of the database is simple.
result.error.remediation: Change the recovery model property of database SPINT_Service_UsageAndHealth to full on the SQL host vmtstdbs40a.rsvgnw.local. Steps: 1. After connecting to the instance INSTANCE3 of the SQL server, in Object Explorer, click the server name to expand the server tree. 2. Expand 'Databases', and select the database. 3. Right-click the database, and then click 'Properties', which opens the 'Database Properties' dialog box. 4. In the 'Select a page' pane, click 'Options'. 5. The current recovery model is displayed in the recovery model list box. 6. To change the recovery model to full, select full from the drop-down menu. 7. Click OK.

protectionPolicy.name: vCenterLab - Daily
host.name: dcs1-103-hv034.rsvgnw.local
asset.name: vmtstfmo2k222
result.error.reason: Unable to restore the following tags for virtual machine vmtstfmo2k222 on vCenter vcenterlab.rsvgnw.local: unknown.
result.error.extendedReason: Failed to Restore VM Tags: org.springframework.web.client.HttpClientErrorException$BadRequest: 400 Bad Request: "{"type":"com.vmware.vapi.std.errors.already_exists","value":{"error_type":"ALREADY_EXISTS","messages":[]}}"
result.error.detailedDescription: The restore of one or more of these virtual machine tags was unsuccessful.
result.error.remediation: Review the error message or the log files at /var/log/brs/vmdm to determine the tags that were not restored properly. To manually add the tags that were not restored, log in to the vCenter and complete the following steps. 1) Create the category and/or tag, if necessary. 2) Browse for the object in the vCenter Client. 3) In the Summary tab or Manage tab, assign the tag to the virtual machine. Repeat this process for all the unsuccessful tag attachments.
